md:
giải nghĩa từ "elastic" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Elastic (adjective) /ɪˈlæstɪk/:
	+ Meaning: (of a material or object) able to return to its original shape after being stretched or compressed.
	+ Vietnamese: đàn hồi, co giãn.
	+ Example: The elastic band snapped back into place after being stretched.
	+ Related words: elasticity, flexible, springy, resilient.
	+ Antonyms: rigid, inflexible, brittle.

* Elastic (noun) /ɪˈlæstɪk/:
	+ Meaning: a material or object that is able to return to its original shape after being stretched or compressed.
	+ Vietnamese: vật đàn hồi, vật co giãn.
	+ Example: The elastic in my socks is starting to wear out.
	+ Related words: rubber, spring, flexible material.
	+ Antonyms: rigid material, inflexible object.

Note: The word "elastic" can also be used figuratively to describe something that is adaptable or able to change shape in response to changing circumstances. For example: "The company's elastic business model allowed it to adapt quickly to changes in the market."

    • Example: The elastic in my socks is starting to wear out.

Note: The word "elastic" can also be used figuratively to describe something that is adaptable or able to change shape in response to changing circumstances. For example: "The company's elastic business model allowed it to adapt quickly to changes in the market."
